58435.「……<pc>さま。\n この紅き煙こそ 世界各国の王たちに\n 漆黒の闇の訪れ:
...<pc>. This red smoke is the smoke
of guidance that warns the kings of the world
of the coming of the darkness.

58436.「この煙は またたく間に 世界中に広がり\n 彼らの目に 触れることでしょう。\:
In no time at all, this smoke will spread
around the world for them to see. And they
will remember the lore.

58437.「王たちが 一堂に会した時……\n 私は 世界の真実を お伝えせねばなりません。:
When the kings gather together I must tell
them the truth of the world. The cruel truth
that is etched in the memory of the stars.

58438.「ですが それこそが 世告げの姫の主導者たる\n 私の使命。この先 何があろうと:
But that is my mission as the leader of the
Oracle Princess. No matter what happens in the
future, I will fulfill that mission.
